TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was arrested by police officers from the anti - terrorism branch of ORG on suspicion of his membership of ORG ( the Revolutionary Left ) and was taken into police custody .
CARDINAL . On DATE he was brought before the investigating judge at ORG , who ordered the applicant 's detention on remand .

CARDINAL . On DATE the public prosecutor at ORG filed a bill of indictment against the applicant and CARDINAL other co - accused , charging them , inter alia , with membership of an illegal armed organisation and for participating in activities that undermined the constitutional order of the ORG . The public prosecutor sought the death penalty for the applicant pursuant to LAW .
CARDINAL . In DATE ORG were abolished following a constitutional amendment and the applicant 's case was transferred to ORG .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE ORG convicted the applicant as charged and sentenced him to life imprisonment .
CARDINAL . The Court of Cassation quashed the judgment of the first - instance court . The case was remitted before ORG where it is still pending .
